Chapter Seven

[Nick]64-nick shut the door behind [him]64-nick and fell into the leather chair . [He]64-nick stared at [his]64-nick drawing board and curled [his]64-nick hands into tight fists to stop the itch . [He]64-nick wanted to create . [He]64-nick envisioned materials such as limestone and brick , with flowing images of glass and sleek curves . The pictures danced behind [his]64-nick closed lids at night , and here [he]64-nick was , owner of [Dreamscape Enterprises]32-dreamscape enterprises , and stuck most of the day in board meetings . [He]64-nick cursed under [his]64-nick breath . Okay , so [the board members]203-the board members aggravated [him]64-nick , with the pencil - pushing tactics and money - grubbing ideas . [Most of [them]203-the board members]204-most of them opposed the waterfront contract , believing [the company]205-the company would go bankrupt if [he]64-nick took the job and could n’t deliver . The board was right . [He]64-nick had a simple solution . Do n’t fail . [Conte]65-conte ’s party was Saturday night and [he]65-conte still had n’t secured a business meeting . [Hyoshi Komo]66-hyoshi komo had n’t called either . Stuck at [square one]206-square one , the only thing to do was wait for [the man]207-the man to make [his]207-the man move , and count down the hours to the party . Maybe [Conte]65-conte was waiting to see how the social function turned out before seeking a meeting , unlike [he]65-conte told [Alexa]67-alexa . [Alexa]67-alexa . [Her]67-alexa name alone was a punch in the gut . [He]64-nick remembered the way [she]67-alexa shrieked and shook [her]67-alexa head and bounced around [the living room]208-the living room in a victory dance after winning chess the night before . [A grown woman]209-a grown woman acting like [a child]210-a child . And once again , [he]64-nick had laughed [his]64-nick ass off . Somehow , as beautiful as [[his]64-nick companions]211-his companions were , [their]211-his companions slick wit only rippled the surface . [Alexandria]67-alexa made [him]64-nick connect with a deep belly laugh , like [he]64-nick was young . [His]64-nick direct line buzzed . [He]64-nick picked up . “ Yes ? ”[64-nick] “ Did [you]67-alexa feed the fish ? ”[64-nick] [Nick]64-nick closed [his]64-nick eyes . “ [Alexa]67-alexa , [I]67-alexa ’m working . ”[67-alexa] [She]67-alexa made a rude snort . “ So am [I.]67-alexa But at least [I]67-alexa worry about poor [Otto]68-otto . Did [you]67-alexa feed [him]68-otto ? ”[67-alexa] “ [Otto]68-otto ? ”[64-nick] “ [You]67-alexa kept calling [him]68-otto [Fish]69-fish . That hurt [his]68-otto feelings . ”[64-nick] “ [Fish]69-fish do n’t have feelings . And yes , [I]67-alexa fed [him]68-otto . ”[67-alexa] “ [Fish]69-fish certainly do have feelings . [Maggie]140-maggie gave [me]71-frost the damn thing as a joke and [I]71-frost hated it on sight . ”[71-frost] [Frost]71-frost nipped through the receiver . “ [Messy]72-messy , too , are n’t [they]72-messy ? [I]71-frost guess [you]64-nick do n’t do [humans]1580-humans or animals . [I]71-frost ’m sorry to inform [you]64-nick , but even fish get lonely . Why do n’t [we]1574-we get [him]64-nick some company ? ”[71-frost] [He]64-nick straightened and decided to put an end to this ridiculous conversation . “ No . [I]212-i do n’t want another fish , and [he]64-nick will not be moved . Do [I]212-i make [myself]212-i clear ? ”[212-i] The line hummed . “ [Crystal]73-crystal . ”[212-i] Then [she]212-i hung up . [Nick]64-nick cursed , grabbed the nearest stack of papers from the last board meeting , and got to work . [The woman]213-the woman actually bothered [him]64-nick at [his]64-nick job about a fish . [He]64-nick pushed the image of [her]213-the woman out of [his]64-nick mind and resumed [his]64-nick work . … “ [He]64-nick ’s gon na be mad . ”[64-nick] [Alexa]67-alexa bit down on [her]67-alexa lower lip and wondered why [Maggie]140-maggie ’s words caused a chill to run down [her]67-alexa spine . After all , [Nick Ryan]64-nick was [no alpha male]214-no alpha male . Sure , [he]64-nick ’d be a little put out from the situation , but [he]64-nick always remained rational . [Others]218-others kept up a furious pace as [they]218-others explored [[their]218-others new home]219-their new home , sniffing in corners and moving from [room to room]220-room to room . [The wire - haired terrier]221-the wire - haired terrier chewed on a throw pillow . The black poodle jumped on the couch and settled down for a nap . [The mutt]222-the mutt looked about ready to lift [his]222-the mutt leg by the speaker , but [Maggie]140-maggie grabbed [him]222-the mutt and threw [him]222-the mutt into [the back yard]223-the back yard before [he]222-the mutt did serious damage . The worry blossomed into a full - fledged panic attack . [Maggie]140-maggie was right . [Nick]64-nick might kill [her]140-maggie . [She]140-maggie turned toward [[her]140-maggie friend]224-her friend . “ What should [I]140-maggie do ? ”[140-maggie] [Maggie]140-maggie shrugged . “ Tell [him]64-nick the truth . [You]140-maggie ’re only taking [them]1581-them for a night or two until [the shelter]1582-the shelter can make other arrangements . If [you]140-maggie give [them]1581-them back , [they]1581-them ’ll all be put to sleep . ”[140-maggie] [She]140-maggie winced . “ What if [he]64-nick still makes [me]140-maggie get rid of [them]1581-them ? ”[140-maggie] “ Take [them]1581-them to [[your]140-maggie apartment]1583-your apartment . ”[140-maggie] “ Too small . ”[140-maggie] [Maggie]140-maggie threw up [her]140-maggie hands when [she]140-maggie spotted the look . “ Hell , no , [I]140-maggie ’m not taking [them]1581-them to [[my]140-maggie place]1584-my place ! [I]140-maggie ’ve got [someone]1585-someone coming over and [he]1585-someone ’ll be a lot warmer than a puppy . [You]140-maggie ’re on [your]140-maggie own . ”[140-maggie] “ But , [Maggs]74-maggs — ”[140-maggie] [Maggie]140-maggie gave a wave . “ Got ta go . [Man]1586-man , [I]140-maggie ’d love to see the show when [[my]140-maggie brother]1587-my brother walks in . Call [me]140-maggie on [my]140-maggie cell . ”[140-maggie] The door shut . [Alexa]67-alexa surveyed [the room]225-the room , now in puppy chaos , and decided [she]67-alexa ’d been a little too impulsive . [She]67-alexa could have reasonably told [the shelter]1582-the shelter [she]67-alexa ’d take a few , then brought them to [[her]67-alexa apartment]227-her apartment . But no , [she]67-alexa ’d been mad at [Nick]64-nick for being [a cold - hearted monster about the fish]228-a cold - hearted monster about the fish , and decided to teach [him]64-nick a lesson . Except now [she]67-alexa was just plain scared . The hound dog gnawed at the table leg . [She]67-alexa pulled [herself]67-alexa together and prepared [her]67-alexa battle plan . [She]67-alexa ’d put them all in [the spare room]229-the spare room and maybe [Nick]64-nick would n’t notice . [He]64-nick never went in [that room]230-that room . [She]67-alexa ’d bring all [their]231-their toys and food and sneak [them]231-their out the back for [their]231-their walks . [She]67-alexa convinced [herself]67-alexa the strategy would work , and herded [the group]232-the group down [the hall]233-the hall . [She]67-alexa dumped out a whole bag of play toys and made sure most of [them]231-their ran after [her]67-alexa . Then [she]67-alexa shut the door , gathered up the sleeping puppies on the couch , the food and water bowls , and some spare newspapers . [She]67-alexa raced out and got the last stray from [the backyard]234-the backyard , and set up [the room]225-the room so the dogs would be comfortable . [Alexa]67-alexa stared worriedly at the beautiful loveseat and chair in swirling patterns of silver and gray . Damn , why did [Nick]64-nick have to be rich ? [[No one]1576-no one [’s spare room]238-’s spare room]237-no one ’s spare room looked this good , with slate carpeting , pewter tables with ornate scrolling , and throws that cost more than [her]67-alexa whole comforter set at [home]239-home . [She]67-alexa ran [her]67-alexa fingers over the soft , precise stitches of an afghan . [She]67-alexa needed some old blankets , and [she]67-alexa bet [[her]67-alexa husband]240-her husband did n’t have one . [She]67-alexa decided to go on a hunt [upstairs]241-upstairs but [she]67-alexa heard the key in the lock . Panicked , [she]67-alexa threw the afghan over the chair and shut the door behind [her]67-alexa . Then [she]67-alexa hurled [herself]67-alexa down [the hallway]242-the hallway and skidded to a stop in front of [him]64-nick . “ Hi . ”[67-alexa] [He]64-nick looked suspicious already . Blond locks slipped over [his]64-nick forehead and [his]64-nick eyes narrowed , as if [he]64-nick did n’t trust [her]67-alexa to be nice . [Guilt]75-guilt squirmed within , but [she]67-alexa ignored the emotion . “ Hi . ”[64-nick] [He]64-nick looked around [the house]243-the house and [she]67-alexa held [her]67-alexa breath . “ What ’s going on ? ”[64-nick] “ Nothing . [I]67-alexa was just about to cook dinner . Unless [you]64-nick ’re tired and want to go to bed right now . ”[67-alexa] One brow shot up at [her]67-alexa hopeful tone . “ It ’s six o’clock . ”[67-alexa] “ Right . [I]64-nick ’ll bring [your]64-nick food [upstairs]241-upstairs to [[your]64-nick office]1589-your office if [you]64-nick want . ”[64-nick] Now , [he]64-nick looked plain irritated . “ [I]64-nick did enough work today . [I]64-nick want to relax with a glass of wine and watch the ball game . ”[64-nick] “ Are [the Mets]76-the mets on ? ”[67-alexa] “ Do n’t know . [They]76-the mets ’re not in the playoffs anyway and [they]76-the mets did n’t make the Wild Card . [Alexa]67-alexa grabbed onto the emotion , grateful the fear had melted away . [She]67-alexa turned [her]67-alexa back and stalked into [the kitchen]217-the kitchen . “ Fine , [I]67-alexa ’m calling in [my]67-alexa favor . ”[67-alexa] [He]64-nick hung [his]64-nick black wool coat in [the closet]245-the closet , then stood in the doorway . [She]67-alexa took out ingredients for the salad [she]67-alexa would n’t eat and cut up vegetables for a stir - fry . [He]64-nick grabbed a bottle of wine from the refrigerator and poured [her]67-alexa a glass . “ What did [you]67-alexa say ? ”[64-nick] “ [I]64-nick ’m calling in [my]64-nick favor . [I]64-nick want to watch the Mets game [downstairs]1591-downstairs on the big TV . [I]64-nick want [you]67-alexa to stay [upstairs]241-upstairs and watch the Yankees game , and [I]64-nick do n’t want to hear a sound . Not a cheer , or a yell , or a ‘ Go Yankees ’ rally . Got it ? ”[64-nick] When [she]67-alexa looked back , [he]64-nick gaped at [her]67-alexa in sheer amazement , as if [she]67-alexa ’d sprouted horns . [She]67-alexa tried to ignore how adorable [he]64-nick looked , with [his]64-nick mouth slightly open , and those incredible shoulders stretched against the pale gray down shirt . Why did [he]64-nick have to be so damn attractive ? The shirt sleeves and collar were still crisp after hours of wear . [His]64-nick charcoal pants still held the crease down the middle . [He]64-nick had unfastened the buttons by the wrist and rolled the material up in [his]64-nick usual fashion . Light - colored hair sprinkled over [his]64-nick forearms and strong fingers gripped the delicate wine glass with a power that made [her]67-alexa fidget when [she]67-alexa thought of the other things [he]64-nick could touch . About [the Author

Jennifer Probst]59-jennifer probst wrote [her]59-jennifer probst first book at twelve years old . [She]59-jennifer probst bound it in a folder , read it to [[her]59-jennifer probst classmates]885-her classmates , and has n’t stopped writing since . [She]59-jennifer probst took a short hiatus to get married , get pregnant , buy [a house]886-a house , get pregnant again , pursue a master ’s in English Literature , and rescue two shelter dogs . Now [she]59-jennifer probst is writing again . [She]59-jennifer probst makes [her]59-jennifer probst home in upstate [New York]9-new york with [the whole crew]887-the whole crew . [[Her]59-jennifer probst two young sons]888-her two young sons keep [her]59-jennifer probst active , stressed , joyous , and sad [[her]59-jennifer probst house]889-her house will never be truly clean . [She]59-jennifer probst is the author of both sexy and erotic contemporary romance . [Her]59-jennifer probst credits include Heart of Steel ; “ Masquerade ”[59-jennifer probst] Secrets Volume 11 ; The Tantric Principle ; Sex , Lies and Contracts ; and Catch [Me]0-i . [She]59-jennifer probst has also written [a children]890-a children ’s book , [Buffy]137-buffy and the Carrot , co - written with [[her]59-jennifer probst twelve - year - old niece]891-her twelve - year - old niece , along with a short story about a shelter dog , A Life Worth Living . [She]59-jennifer probst is thrilled to share [her]59-jennifer probst new series , Marriage to [a Billionaire]395-a billionaire , with [Entangled readers]893-entangled readers . All of [her]59-jennifer probst books are available at [her]59-jennifer probst website , http://www.jenniferprobst.com . [She]59-jennifer probst loves hearing from [[her]59-jennifer probst readers]894-her readers so drop [her]59-jennifer probst a line or stalk [her]59-jennifer probst on Facebook and Twitter !

Chapter One

[She]897-your daughter needed [a man]279-a man . Preferably one with $ 150,000 to spare . [Alexandria Maria McKenzie]67-alexa stared into the small homemade campfire in the middle of [[her]67-alexa living room floor]899-her living room floor and wondered if [she]67-alexa had officially lost [her]67-alexa mind . The piece of paper in [her]67-alexa hand held all the qualities [she]67-alexa dreamed [[her]67-alexa soul mate]900-her soul mate would possess . Loyalty . Intelligence . Humor . A strong sense of [family]744-family and a love for animals . A healthy income . Most of [her]67-alexa ingredients were already cooking . One hair from [a male family member]902-a male family member — [[her]67-alexa brother]1857-her brother was still pissed . A mix of scented herbs — probably to give [him]1857-her brother a tender side . And the small stick for … well , [she]67-alexa hoped that did n’t mean what [she]67-alexa feared . With a deep breath , [she]67-alexa threw the list into the silver bucket and watched it burn . [She]67-alexa felt like [an idiot]1607-an idiot for creating a love spell , but [she]67-alexa had no options left and little to lose . As [the owner of [an eclectic bookstore in [a trendy upstate New York college town]907-a trendy upstate new york college town]906-an eclectic bookstore in a trendy upstate new york college town]905-the owner of an eclectic bookstore in a trendy upstate new york college town , [she]67-alexa figured [she]67-alexa was allowed some quirks . Like sending up a prayer to [Earth Mother]131-earth mother for [the perfect man]908-the perfect man . [Alexa]67-alexa reached over and grabbed the fire extinguisher as the flames leaped . The smoke rose and reminded [her]67-alexa of the burnt pizza crust on the bottom of [her]67-alexa toaster oven . [She]67-alexa crinkled [her]67-alexa nose , shot the spray in the middle of [her]67-alexa carpet , and went to hunt up a glass of red wine to celebrate . [[Her]67-alexa mom]546-her mom would have to sell [Tara]138-tara . [[Her]67-alexa family home]910-her family home . Chapter Two
